# The `MCOperand` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Instances of this class represent operands of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> class. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::MCOperand</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Instances of this class represent operands of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> class.

This is a simple discriminated union.

Definition at line 37 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcinst-h">MCInst.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationListItem>

<EnumerationListItem name="kSFPImmediate">

</EnumerationListItem>

<EnumerationListItem name="kExpr">
